title: fry
description: Chicken stir fry is very quick and easy to make, with plenty of flavour and healthy vegetables.This meal provides 674 kcal, 53g protein, 60g carbohydrate (of which 14g sugars), 23g fat (of which 4.5g saturates), 9g fibre and 2g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 chicken or vegetable stock cube or similar
2 skinless chicken breasts (or you can use pork tenderloin)
200g/7oz mushrooms, shiitake or chestnut, halved or quartered
1 red pepper, deseeded and thickly sliced
thumb-size piece fresh root ginger, thinly sliced
3 tbsp hoisin sauce, mixed with 2 tbsp water
